meanings.definition: To present or introduce together with someone else.
meanings.sent1: She copresents the award with her colleague.
meanings.sent2: The two actors copresented the new movie at the film festival.
meanings.sent3: The magician copresents the trick with his assistant for added flair.
meanings.sent4: The chef copresents the main course with a delicious dessert.
meanings.sent5: The teacher copresents the lesson with interactive visuals for better understanding.

meanings.definition: To be present at the same time as someone else.
meanings.sent1: He copresents at the meeting with his boss.
meanings.sent2: The singer copresents on stage with the band during the concert.
meanings.sent3: The cat copresents in the room when the dog enters, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: The sun copresents with the moon in the evening sky.
meanings.sent5: The student copresents in the classroom when the teacher arrives.
